name: Big Hat
description:
Big Hat is a puzzle game and you are helping a Big Hat Robot!

Play with mouse and space(also as action button)

How to play example: If you want AI to move right while AI is on the ground, click Is AI on ground button and select a behaviour. You can enable or disable that when AI tries to pass the level. Also you have an action button for manually Jump or Dash. Also you can(should) adjust "close to" parameter on the right up corner for conditions.

Made for Wowie 4.0 GameJam. I used some free png files on the net.

Made by Musa Odabaşı
